hero.tagline: Excellence in Oral Health and Wellness
hero.subtitle: A multidisciplinary clinic dedicated to your smile and quality of life, with three decades of experience serving the community.

intro.label: Welcome
intro.title: We Care for Your Smile with Dedication
intro.description: At Clínica Dentária Marina Macedo, we combine cutting-edge technology with personalized and humanized care. Our multidisciplinary team is committed to providing you with the best oral health and overall wellness care.

services.label: Our Services
services.title: Specialized Care
services.description: We offer a complete range of medical and dental services for the whole family.

experience.title: Proven Experience
experience.description: Over three decades of dedication to the oral health and wellness of our patients.

team.title: Multidisciplinary Team
team.description: Qualified professionals in various medical and dental specialties.

technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.description: Modern equipment for accurate diagnoses and effective treatments.

comfort.title: Welcoming Environment
comfort.description: Spaces designed for your comfort and tranquility during appointments.

locations.label: Where We Are
locations.title: Our Clinics
locations.description: Three convenient locations to better serve you.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Smile?
cta.description: Get in touch with us and schedule your appointment. Our team is ready to take care of you.

hero.label: About Us
hero.title: A History of Dedication to Health
hero.description: Since our founding, we have been building relationships of trust with our patients, offering excellent healthcare.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Clínica Dentária Marina Macedo was born from the dream of creating a space where oral health and general wellness could be treated with the same dedication and professionalism. Over the years, we have evolved from a small dental clinic to a complete multidisciplinary center.
story.p2: With three strategic locations in Amares, Adaúfe and Bouro, we are able to be closer to the communities we serve, always maintaining the same standards of quality and excellence that characterize us.
story.p3: Our philosophy centers on the patient, treating each person as unique, with their specific needs and expectations. We believe that a healthy smile is fundamental to quality of life and self-esteem.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide excellent oral health and wellness care, in a welcoming environment with cutting-edge technology, contributing to the quality of life of our patients.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be recognized as a reference clinic in the region, for the quality of services provided, constant innovation and patient satisfaction.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Commitment to the highest quality standards.

ethics.title: Ethics
ethics.description: Transparency and integrity in all our actions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Constant updating of techniques and technologies.

humanization.title: Humanization
humanization.description: Personalized care and respect for individuality.

team.label: Our Team
team.title: Excellence Professionals
team.description: A multidisciplinary team dedicated to your wellness and oral health.

hero.label: Services
hero.title: Complete Health Care
hero.description: We offer a wide range of medical and dental services, always focused on quality and patient wellness.

orthodontics.alignersDesc: Custom-made for each patient with thermoplastic and biocompatible plastic material, comfortably adapting to the anatomy of each mouth.
orthodontics.howItWorksDesc: They work through the controlled application of gentle and progressive forces that gradually move the teeth to the desired positions. Each set of aligners is worn for approximately two weeks before moving to the next.
orthodontics.casesDescription: See real examples of transformations with our orthodontic treatments.

oralSurgery.whatIsDesc: Area of dental medicine dedicated to the diagnosis and surgical treatment of maxillary pain and tensions and structures related to teeth.

prosthetics.fixedDesc: Fixed Prosthetics offers permanent solutions to restore damaged teeth or replace missing teeth. Includes crowns, bridges and veneers that are cemented to the teeth, providing a stable and lasting solution.
prosthetics.removableDesc: Removable Prosthetics offers accessible and effective solutions to replace multiple teeth or complete dentitions. These are prostheses that can be removed for hygiene and maintenance.

implantology.whatAreImplantsDesc: They are small structures, usually made of titanium, that are surgically placed in the maxillary or mandibular bone, functioning as an artificial root.
implantology.biocompatibilityDesc: Titanium is a biocompatible metal, which means it is well tolerated by the body and allows osseointegration, i.e., the union of the implant to the bone, providing stability and durability to the treatment.
implantology.objectiveDesc: To restore the patient's masticatory function, aesthetics and self-esteem, providing a fixed, safe and lasting solution for tooth loss.
implantology.indicationsDesc: Implant placement is indicated for patients who have lost one or more teeth and want a fixed solution without resorting to removable prostheses.
implantology.oneToothDesc: A missing tooth should be replaced by a dental implant to prevent future problems.
implantology.severalTeethDesc: If you have two or more missing teeth, the ideal solution is to replace them with an implant-supported bridge.
implantology.allTeethDesc: Total rehabilitation with All-on-4 or All-on-6 protocol for a fixed and definitive solution.
advantagesList: Recovery of masticatory function and speech
Improvement of facial aesthetics and smile
implantology.casesDescription: See real examples of dental implant rehabilitations performed at our clinic.
implantology.case1Desc: Replacement of central incisor with implant and ceramic crown for natural aesthetic result.
implantology.case2Desc: Rehabilitation of 3 posterior teeth with fixed bridge supported by 2 implants.
implantology.case3Desc: All-on-4 protocol for complete upper arch rehabilitation with immediate loading.

tmj.description: Temporomandibular Dysfunction (TMD) affects the joint and chewing muscles, which can cause pain, clicking, difficulty opening the mouth and even difficulty closing when in maximum opening with a simple yawn.
tmj.painDescription: Orofacial pain is pain located in the face, mouth or jaw, with different origins that require specialized evaluation to determine the cause and appropriate treatment.
symptoms: Pain in the face and jaw region
Difficulty opening or closing the mouth
Muscle tension in the face and neck

splints.title: Occlusal Splints
splints.desc: Custom devices for protection and muscle relaxation

physiotherapy.title: Physiotherapy
physiotherapy.desc: Specific exercises for the temporomandibular joint

medication.title: Medication
medication.desc: Anti-inflammatories and muscle relaxants when needed

general-dentistry.title: General Dentistry
general-dentistry.shortDesc: Preventive and restorative care to maintain your oral health.
general-dentistry.description: General Dentistry is the foundation of all oral care. It encompasses prevention, diagnosis and treatment of the most common conditions affecting teeth and gums.
general-dentistry.whoIsItFor: Ideal for everyone who wants to maintain good oral health, prevent future problems or treat existing conditions such as cavities, dental sensitivity or gum problems.
general-dentistry.whatToExpect: The appointment includes a complete oral exam, professional cleaning, and when necessary, treatments such as restorations or scaling. You will also receive personalized guidance to care for your oral health at home.

pediatric-dentistry.title: Pediatric Dentistry
pediatric-dentistry.shortDesc: Specialized dental care for children in a welcoming environment.
pediatric-dentistry.description: Pediatric Dentistry is dedicated to children's oral health, from babies to adolescence. Our goal is to create positive experiences that promote healthy habits for life.
pediatric-dentistry.whoIsItFor: Children from their first teeth to adolescence. Especially recommended for parents who want to establish good oral health habits early.
pediatric-dentistry.whatToExpect: Appointments are conducted in a playful and welcoming manner, so children feel comfortable. We perform age-appropriate exams, fluoride application when indicated, and guide parents on daily care.

prosthetics.title: Fixed and Removable Prosthetics
prosthetics.shortDesc: Personalized solutions to restore the function and aesthetics of your smile.
prosthetics.description: Prosthodontics offers solutions to replace lost or damaged teeth, restoring masticatory function, speech and smile aesthetics through fixed or removable prostheses.
prosthetics.whoIsItFor: People who have lost one or more teeth, or who have severely damaged teeth that need rehabilitation.
benefits: Prevention of problems associated with missing teeth
prosthetics.whatToExpect: The process begins with a complete evaluation and personalized planning. Impressions or scans will be made to create the custom prosthesis. After placement, we make adjustments to ensure comfort and functionality.

aesthetic-dentistry.title: Aesthetic Dentistry
aesthetic-dentistry.shortDesc: Transform your smile with advanced aesthetic treatments.
aesthetic-dentistry.description: Aesthetic Dentistry combines art and science to improve the appearance of your smile. It includes whitening, veneers, aesthetic restorations and gingival contouring.
aesthetic-dentistry.whoIsItFor: Anyone who wants to improve the appearance of their smile, whether correcting color, shape, size or alignment of teeth.
aesthetic-dentistry.whatToExpect: We start with an evaluation consultation to understand your goals. We present the most suitable treatment options and create a personalized plan to achieve the smile you have always wanted.

implantology.title: Implantology and Oral Surgery
implantology.shortDesc: State-of-the-art dental implants for a permanent solution.
implantology.description: Implantology offers the most advanced solution for replacing lost teeth. Implants function as artificial roots, providing a solid base for crowns, bridges or prostheses.
implantology.whoIsItFor: People who have lost one or more teeth and are looking for a permanent, stable and aesthetically natural solution.
implantology.whatToExpect: Treatment begins with detailed exams and digital planning. Implant placement is done under local anesthesia, followed by a healing period. Finally, the definitive crown is placed.

endodontics.title: Endodontics
endodontics.shortDesc: Root canal treatment to save compromised teeth.
endodontics.description: Endodontics treats problems inside the tooth, specifically the dental pulp. Root canal treatment saves teeth that would otherwise have to be extracted.
endodontics.whoIsItFor: People with infections or inflammation in the dental pulp, severe pain or prolonged sensitivity to heat and cold.
endodontics.whatToExpect: Treatment is performed under local anesthesia for your comfort. We remove infected tissue, clean and disinfect the canals, and seal the tooth. A crown is usually needed to protect the treated tooth.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics
orthodontics.shortDesc: Dental alignment for a perfect smile at any age.
orthodontics.description: Orthodontics corrects the positioning of teeth and jaws, improving masticatory function, aesthetics and overall oral health. We offer traditional and invisible options.
orthodontics.whoIsItFor: Children, teenagers and adults with misaligned teeth, crowding, excessive spacing or bite problems.
orthodontics.whatToExpect: After a complete evaluation with exams and photographs, we present a personalized treatment plan. Treatment time varies according to complexity, with regular appointments for adjustments.

tmj.title: TMJ & Orofacial Pain
tmj.shortDesc: Specialized treatment for temporomandibular joint dysfunctions.
tmj.description: The TMJ and Orofacial Pain specialty treats problems of the joint that connects the jaw to the skull, as well as related headaches, facial and cervical pain.
tmj.whoIsItFor: People with jaw pain, clicking when opening the mouth, difficulty chewing, frequent headaches or teeth grinding.
tmj.whatToExpect: The evaluation includes a detailed clinical examination and possibly imaging exams. Treatment may include occlusal splints, physiotherapy, medication or other approaches as needed.

periodontics.title: Periodontology
periodontics.description: Periodontology is dedicated to the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of diseases affecting the gums and supporting tissues of teeth.
periodontics.whoIsItFor: People with inflamed, bleeding or receding gums, persistent bad breath or tooth mobility.
periodontics.whatToExpect: The complete periodontal evaluation determines the state of your gums. Treatment may include deep scaling, root planing or, in advanced cases, regenerative procedures.

ent.title: ENT (Otolaryngology)
ent.shortDesc: Diagnosis and treatment of ear, nose and throat problems.
ent.description: Otolaryngology treats conditions affecting the ears, nose, throat, head and neck. From allergies to hearing problems, we offer comprehensive care.
ent.whoIsItFor: People with hearing problems, sinusitis, frequent tonsillitis, snoring, vertigo or other ENT conditions.
ent.whatToExpect: The consultation includes a complete evaluation of symptoms and detailed physical examination. Additional tests may be necessary. Treatment is personalized to your specific needs.

general-medicine.title: General & Family Medicine
general-medicine.shortDesc: Primary healthcare for the whole family.
general-medicine.description: General and Family Medicine offers comprehensive and continuous healthcare, focused on prevention, diagnosis and treatment of a wide range of conditions.
general-medicine.whoIsItFor: Everyone who needs primary healthcare, chronic disease monitoring or general medical guidance.
general-medicine.whatToExpect: Consultations allow for a comprehensive evaluation of your health, with time to discuss concerns, perform exams and define a personalized care plan.

orthopedics.title: Orthopedics
orthopedics.shortDesc: Treatment of musculoskeletal and joint problems.
orthopedics.description: Orthopedics is dedicated to the diagnosis and treatment of injuries and diseases of the musculoskeletal system, including bones, joints, muscles and tendons.
orthopedics.whoIsItFor: People with joint pain, sports injuries, spine problems, osteoarthritis or other orthopedic conditions.
orthopedics.whatToExpect: The consultation includes a detailed evaluation of your condition, possibly with imaging exams. The treatment plan may include medication, physiotherapy or, when necessary, surgery.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.shortDesc: Personalized nutritional guidance for a healthier life.
nutrition.description: The Nutrition service offers specialized dietary counseling, helping you achieve your health goals through balanced and sustainable nutrition.
nutrition.whoIsItFor: People who want to lose weight, manage conditions such as diabetes or cholesterol, improve sports performance or simply adopt a healthier diet.
nutrition.whatToExpect: The first consultation includes a complete assessment of your eating habits, body measurements and goal setting. You will receive a personalized meal plan and regular follow-up.

massage.title: Therapeutic & Relaxation Massages
massage.shortDesc: Wellness treatments to relieve tension and promote relaxation.
massage.description: Our massage services combine therapeutic and relaxation techniques to relieve muscle pain, reduce stress and promote overall wellness.
massage.whoIsItFor: Anyone looking to relieve muscle tension, reduce stress, improve circulation or simply relax.
massage.whatToExpect: Before the session, we do a brief assessment of your needs and preferences. The massage is performed in a calm and relaxing environment, adapted to your goals.

protocols.contact: For more information about the specific conditions of each protocol, please contact us.
